Package de.gym.frontend

Class AdminSceneCreator

java.lang.Object
de.gym.frontend.AdminSceneCreator
public class AdminSceneCreator
extends java.lang.Object
Registration form, usually used for registering users, by an admin. Based on the user role, the registration form requires additional information to be filled in. In addition to the registration form, a user having the admin role can obtain a full overview of the registered users.
Author:
florina
